name: Green Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walking, 60 ft. flying, 30 ft. swimming
description: The Green Dragon Wyrmling is a medium dragon known for its green scales and agile movements, often found in forested environments. It exhibits a powerful presence with its sharp teeth and claws.
memorable: Its potent Poison Breath ability can severely injure unprepared parties, and it excels at ambush tactics due to its Woodland Stalker trait.
goals: To dominate its territory, utilizing stealth and poison to overwhelm foes.
relations: Often found alone or in the company of other dragonkin, serving as a young protector of its lair.
strengths: Immunities to poison damage and the poisoned condition make it resilient to certain attacks.
weaknesses: Relatively low hit points compared to older dragons can make it vulnerable if targeted effectively.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a Bite and Claw, dealing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Poison Breath, a devastating area attack that can affect multiple targets at once.
senses: Blindsight allows it to detect creatures within a 10-foot radius without relying on sight.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, particularly enhanced in forested areas.
additional_information: Amphibious nature allows breathing both air and water.
Woodland Stalker trait grants advantage on Stealth in forests.
Pounce ability can knock foes prone for tactical advantage.
Can impact multiple characters simultaneously with Poison Breath.
Young yet formidable, it presents a moderate threat to adventurers.
